column2: In the United States, there is information voters need to register and vote. Where are you most likely to look for this information? Please select up to three.
column3: If you wanted to know more about how elections are run in the United States, where would you be most likely look for that information? Please select up to three.
column4: If you are interested in learning about the winner of an election, where would you be most likely to look for results? Please select up to three.
